markdownRemark.html: It’s easy to sit, watch and wait as the world reacts to covid-19. It’s much harder to take action. It’s time to get to work. Looking back months later, consider what good work can come out of this time. Develop platforms to help others lead and connect.

frontmatter.description: It's much harder to take action. It's time to get to work. Looking back months later, consider what good work can come out of this time.
frontmatter.title: Develop platforms to help others lead and connect
